SELECT t.code ,t.dealer_code ,t.start_datetime ,t.end_datetime ,t.province ,t.city ,t.area ,t.address ,t.longitude ,t.latitude ,t.price ,t.summary ,t.pic ,t.detail ,t.status ,t.create_datetime ,t.updater ,t.update_datetime ,t.remark ,tdealer.pic dealer_pic ,tdealer.name dealer_name FROM tp_demand t LEFT JOIN tp_dealer tdealer ON t.dealer_code = tdealer.code
t.${order}

SELECT t.code ,t.dealer_code ,t.start_datetime ,t.end_datetime ,t.province ,t.city ,t.area ,t.address ,t.longitude ,t.latitude ,t.price ,t.summary ,t.pic ,t.status ,t.create_datetime ,tdealer.pic dealer_pic ,tdealer.name dealer_name ,ROUND(6378.138*2*ASIN(SQRT(POW(SIN((#{latitude}*PI()/180-t.latitude*PI()/180)/2),2)+COS(#{latitude}*PI()/180)*COS(t.latitude*PI()/180)*POW(SIN((#{longitude}*PI()/180-t.longitude*PI()/180)/2),2)))*1000) as distance FROM tp_demand t LEFT JOIN tp_dealer tdealer ON t.dealer_code = tdealer.code
t.${order}

SELECT count(1) FROM (SELECT ROUND(6378.138*2*ASIN(SQRT(POW(SIN((#{latitude}*PI()/180-t.latitude*PI()/180)/2),2)+COS(#{latitude}*PI()/180)*COS(t.latitude*PI()/180)*POW(SIN((#{longitude}*PI()/180-t.longitude*PI()/180)/2),2)))*1000) as distance FROM tp_demand t ) as demandTable
